Body:
self._do_memory_test(
    """
        <%def name="a()">
            this is a, and y is ${y}
        </%def>

        ${a()}

        <%
            y = 7
        %>

        ${a()}

"""
    , 'this is a, and y is None this is a, and y is 7', filters=
    flatten_result, template_args={'y': None})
